scripts.build:package: cd npm-packages/meteor-vite && meteor npm run build
scripts.build:vue: meteor npm run build:package && (cd examples/vue && meteor npm run meteor-vite-internal:build)
scripts.build:react: meteor npm run build:package && (cd examples/react && meteor npm run meteor-vite-internal:build)
scripts.build:svelte: meteor npm run build:package && (cd examples/svelte && meteor npm run meteor-vite-internal:build)
scripts.link:package: meteor npm run link:vue && meteor npm run link:svelte
scripts.start:vue: meteor npm run build:package && (cd examples/vue && meteor npm run meteor-vite-internal:start)
scripts.start:svelte: meteor npm run build:package && (cd examples/svelte && meteor npm run meteor-vite-internal:start)
scripts.start:react: meteor npm run build:package && (cd examples/react && meteor npm run meteor-vite-internal:start)
